Author: jsnx
Title: English as Internationalization
Content: English has borrowed liberally from other languages, so it's no surprise that English spelling and grammar are inconsistent and vague. As more non-native English speakers use English for business, correspondence and study, English will change, in ways that are hinted at by this alternative edition of the English Wikipedia.

Author: earthboundkid
Content: Install X11 on your Mac and set it to run in fullscreen mode. Then install xemacs or whatever and you're set. When you're in X11, fullscreen programming. When you Cmd-tab away, OS X goodness.
